overview: While Bunny is in the shower her husband goes through her purse and finds out she's cheating. He follows Bunny to a hotel and catches her in the act fucking his friend Lucas! Athena wakes up in the middle of the night for some phone sex that leads to a late night hotel visit with her husbands friend from work. When her husband surprises them dressed as room service, Athena ends it for good and fucks his friend all night.
tagline: Horny wives caught in the act!
title: She Fucked My Friend
